title: Farmer training program boosts yields
summary: Practical training in sustainable farming helped local farmers increase crop yields and incomes.

title: Community school opens in Lailenpi
summary: TSD opened a new community school in Lailenpi to support local learners and teachers.

title: Community health outreach reaches 500 people
summary: Mobile clinics and health education reached hundreds with vaccinations and preventive care.

title: Women's cooperative launches sewing enterprise
summary: A women's cooperative started a community sewing enterprise to generate income and skills.

title: Renewable energy project powers school
summary: Solar panels and battery storage now power the school's classrooms and lighting.
